1.title: 1. APPLICATION AND ACCEPTANCE OF THE CONDITIONS

11.title: 1.1 Terms and conditions of use
11.content: Before using the services offered by Temacina.com, please read these terms and conditions carefully. By registering for the first time with an e-mail address and password, and by providing the required information and checking the box to accept all terms, conditions, policies, and legal notices, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. Your use of the services of the Temacina.com Marketplace, an electronic platform for the exchange of information about products and services between sellers and buyers (collectively referred to as the "Services" below), is subject to the terms and conditions set forth in this document as well as our Privacy Policy. These Terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you, as a user(s) of the Marketplace (hereinafter referred to as "you", "your" or "User"), and Temacina.com. This document, together with other rules and policies governing the Marketplace and the Website, are collectively referred to as the "Terms". By accessing or using the Services or the Marketplace, you agree to all of the Terms. Please do not access or use the Services or the Marketplace if you do not agree to all of the Terms.

12.title: 1.2 Acceptance conditions
12.content: You cannot access the Services or the Marketplace "Platform", "Website", You must accept our Privacy Policy, General Terms and Conditions of Use, General Terms and Conditions of Sale and Product Listing Policy. Be over 18 years of age. Any type of company corresponding to the activities authorised to publish and sell these products and services in accordance with the general conditions of sale for the Algerian market. Any type of foreign company or country of origin dealing with commercial relations with Algeria.

13.title: 1.3 Modification of the service or conditions of use
13.content: We reserve the right to make changes to all or any part of the Temacina.com Service, our procedures, terms and conditions, including these Terms and Conditions of Use at any time. You are subject to the terms and conditions, procedures and Terms of Use in effect at the time you use the Temacina.com Service, which may modify the Terms at any time by posting the modified Terms with the date of modification. Temacina.com will notify you of any material changes to the Terms by posting the relevant changes on the Marketplace "Platform", "Website".

14.title: 1.4 Language and translation
14.content: The French language remains the official language of all terms, conditions, policies and legal notices of the Marketplace "Platform", "Website". English and Arabic translations are provided for convenience only and the French language shall govern your access to and use of the Platform, Website Marketplace Services.

15.title: 1.5 Waiver
15.content: If you breach these Terms of Use and we take no action, we will still be entitled to use our rights and remedies in all other situations where you breach these Terms of Use.

2.title: 2. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY IN ALGERIA AND INTERNATIONALLY
2.content: All content present or made available through the Temacina.com Services, such as text, graphics, logos, buttons, images, music, digital downloads, and data compilations, is the property of Temacina.com or its content suppliers and is protected by Algerian and international intellectual property, copyright and database protection laws. The compilation of all content present or made available through the Temacina.com Services is the exclusive property of Temacina.com and is protected by Algerian and international intellectual property and database protection law. You must not systematically extract and/or re-utilise parts of the content of any Temacina.com Service without our permission. In particular, you must not use a data mining robot or any other similar data gathering or extraction tool to extract (in one or more instances) or re-utilise any substantial part of any Temacina.com Service without our consent. You must also not create and/or publish your own databases which contain substantial parts of any Temacina.com Service without our consent.

3.title: 3. TRADEMARKS AND USERS IN GENERAL
3.content: The graphics, logos, page headers, buttons, reproduce, download, republish, sell, distribute or resell services or information, text, images, graphics, video clips, sounds, directories, files, databases or lists, etc. available on or through the sites (the "Site Content"), scripts and service names included or made available through a Temacina.com Service are trademarks or trade dress of Temacina.com. Temacina.com's trademarks and trade dress may not be used in connection with any product or service that is not Temacina.com's, or in any manner that is likely to cause confusion among customers, or in any manner that disparages or discredits Temacina.com. All other trademarks not owned by Temacina.com that appear on any Temacina.com Service are the property of their respective owners, who may or may not be affiliated with, connected to, or sponsored by Temacina.com.

4.title: 4. USER ACCOUNTS
4.content: The User must be registered on the Sites in order to access certain Services (a registered user is also referred to as a "User"). Unless Temacina.com agrees otherwise, a User may register only one user account with Temacina.com. Temacina.com may cancel or terminate a User's account if Temacina.com has reason to suspect that the User has registered or has control over two or more user accounts simultaneously. In addition, Temacina.com may reject the User's application for registration for any reason whatsoever. Upon registration on the Sites, Temacina.com assigns an account and issues a user ID and password to each registered user. An account may include a web-based e-mail account with limited storage space allowing the user to send or receive e-mail. A user's identifier and password are unique for a single account. Each user is solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality and security of their user ID and password, and for all use of and activity under their account (whether or not such use or activity is authorised). No user may share, assign or authorise the use of their user account, login or password by any other person, even to other persons within the user's own business entity.

51.title: 5.1 Declaration, guarantee
51.content: Each user affirms that they have the necessary power and authority to accept the conditions, grant the licence and authorisation and perform the obligations set out herein. They acknowledge that their access to and use of the sites and services is for business purposes only. For users who are commercial entities, the address provided at the time of registration must be the entity's principal place of business.

52.title: 5.2 Information and material supplied by the user
52.content: Users must provide information or material about their entity, company or products/services during the registration process on the Sites. They guarantee that all information and documents provided are true, accurate, certified, current and complete.

53.title: 5.3 Contact details and personal information
53.content: By becoming a user, they consent to the inclusion of their contact information in the database and authorize Temacina.com and its affiliates to share such contact information with third parties, for purposes of informing users of other services or for other business purposes. Users are responsible for keeping their contact details up to date. They must ensure that their activities on the Sites comply with all applicable laws.

54.title: 5.4 Liability
54.content: Users are responsible for obtaining all necessary licences and authorisations for any user content submitted, published or displayed. They guarantee that this content does not infringe any third-party rights and that they have the right to sell the products or services described.

55.title: 5.5 Criteria
55.content: User Content must be true, accurate, complete and lawful. It must not be false, misleading, defamatory, discriminatory or in breach of any applicable laws or regulations.

56.title: 5.6 User conduct
56.content: Users must carry out their activities on the sites in accordance with the applicable laws and regulations. They must not use the services for illegal or fraudulent activities.

57.title: 5.7 Restrictions
57.content: Users may not use the Sites, the Services or their account for activities that are identical or similar to those of Temacina.com  .

58.title: 5.8 Use for professional purposes
58.content: The Temacina marketplace may only be used by companies and their representatives for professional purposes.

59.title: 5.9 Compliance with local laws and regulations
59.content: Each user is responsible for complying with local laws and regulations regarding the use of the Temacina.com  Marketplace.
